name: You Probably Won't Survive
description:
You Probably Won't Survive

You Probably Won't Survive is a zombie survival game that was created for the Miz Game Jam #1, where participants could only use a set art kit for the game.

In this game, you play as a character who is stuck on an island, and must survive waves of monsters that come out and try to kill you.

How to Play:

Before the wave begins, use your axe to chop down some trees. You can use the wood collected from trees to build a temporary base, and the saplings collected from trees to replant them.

During the wave, you can use your gun to kill the monsters, or you can try hide out in your base to survive.

Try to survive all 7 waves to win, killing enemies to receive more points. 

Controls:

W,A,S,D to move.

Mouse to aim.

Left Mouse Button to use tool / attack / shoot.

Right Mouse Button to build / plant sapling.
